definition: to go to work/to start work
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
work/worker/skill/profession/trade/craft/labor

sentences.english: The people working here tonight have no beef with the picket line .
sentences.chinese: 今晚在這裏上工的人與遊行罷工的人並無芥蒂。

sentences.english: Application of geogrid in domain of anti-reflection cracking is summarized.
sentences.chinese: 對上工網在路面反射裂縫防治方面的應用做了綜述。

sentences.english: To treat the undiseased is the most advanced medical theory.
sentences.chinese: “上工治未病”是最先進的醫學觀。

sentences.english: He escaped being killed in the blast because he had not gone to work.
sentences.chinese: 他因未去上工才避免在那次爆炸中罹難。

sentences.english: That number showed that we were taken on.
sentences.chinese: 這個號碼就是上工的證明。

sentences.english: He has the cheek to ask for a rise after a week in his new job.
sentences.chinese: 他上工才一個星期，竟厚着臉皮要加工資。

sentences.english: You may come back to work if you'll behave yourself, she says.
sentences.chinese: 她說你要是能知道檢點，你仍舊可以回去上工。

sentences.english: They started work early and finished late every day.
sentences.chinese: 他們每天上工早收工晚。

sentences.english: At five the first hooter sounds.
sentences.chinese: 五點鐘，上工的汽笛聲響了。

sentences.english: I had nothing to eat for two days; I floated into work.
sentences.chinese: 接連兩天我什麼都沒喫，飄飄然去上工。

sentences.english: He patched up an old bicycle to ride to work and save carfare.
sentences.chinese: 他修補了一輛舊自行車，騎車上工，省下了。

definition: to knock off (at the end of a day's work)/to finish work
erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]
to work/to be employed
erhua variant of 做活[zuo4 huo2]
work point (measure of work completed in a rural commune in the PRC during the planned economy era)
to help with farm work/casual laborer
busy farming season
(dialect) to begin to dawn/to be just getting light
to change shift/the next work shift/to relieve (a workman on the previous shift)/to take over the job
daybreak
to stop work for the day (generally of laborers)/to knock off
salary/wages
foreman
dusk
production team
work/manual labor
